Articles.Content:
I... I... *cries*

I want my 193 posts back! WAAHHH

Again rep points. Thanks guys, that really helped.

Edited April 19, 2013 by ROFLCopter64bit

That would get nasty. The reborns have already proven themselves difficult to destroy!

Yes but the elders are wise and experienced. I think the easiest thing to do is gang up on the newcomers xD
Yeah but I signed up the day before the downtime I think lol

:'( I have no idea why, but for some reason I almost wanna cry, R.I.P. old me... Also if the spaceport was down, how come I could still get on it fine and download two mods, it was only a little slower and I'm pretty sure it was while the forums werent working, I got ISA Mapsat, and hyper edit, and ksp is fine, I know how all the people who lost their account feels, and I feel bad for them...

Spaceport got up 2(?) days earlier than the forums I think and it was up on and off a day before aswell I think.

Edited April 19, 2013 by Carlbergh
You have your accounts erased: ask Jebediah about that (as in my signature)
Yea I lost my account and all my posts etc Its a sad day.
Posting to test? 1, 2, testing?
Mine account got deleted too. When I tried to search nothing existed, and some of the sub-forums are gone too.
I wonder if Jebediah feels this way after every time I've killed him and he's been reborn?
I didn't loss my account but I had just reached my 100th post 79 to go
I feel the need to post on random threads to reach those 5 posts for ease of use in the future.

I feel the need to post on random threads to reach those 5 posts for ease of use in the future.

I seem to do that even when I have gone over 5 posts.

Mine was also erased, along with all of my posts.

The only thing i see good out of this is that the Brony community also took a hit.

Me:(

I came here in November

Me:(

I came here in November

Just as a question, how many posts did you have before the GDDoS?
My account was partially deleted. I would not access it using my normal password etc. so I had to get it authenticated.
That actually happened to me in the last redesign, I have the exact same username and it said it was unused, SQUAD Y MY ACCONT NOT THERE!!?
gotta reach 5 posts again yes my account was deleted, too bad I signed up in December 2012 while I began playing KSP in October.
^Same here. I still remember the day I first played KSP as October 20th, 2012 (what a good day and overall month that was), but I only registered on here in March.
Nope, I'm only 300 posts behind though. Also my awesome signature is gone and I can't get it back. I deleted it a few weeks after I made it

Nope, I'm only 300 posts behind though. Also my awesome signature is gone and I can't get it back. I deleted it a few weeks after I made it

Never delete graphics, just stash them in a folder or Imgur
And so is mine
Not mine..yaya
If I didn't need five posts again I wouldn't of bother putting a "yes" in here.
